title: I didn't get a gold icon when i got gold for flex and solo/duo.
body: This is really frustrating, even tho people arent honor level 2, people should recieve the icons that they worked for. It is fair that the victorious skins wont be given but the rank that they worked for is something that needs to be considered. This completely demoralizes players who aren't honor level 2 to not play much anymore considering they're not even getting the rewards.

replies.body:
Ah.
season rewards don't come out.
and also, since you are a EUNE player, go talk about it on EUNE boards?

>and also, since you are a EUNE player, go talk about it on EUNE boards?

why does it matter? it's the same game. the rules don't change just because you're from a different server

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-11-13T07:19:00.124+0000)
>
> why does it matter? it's the same game. the rules don't change just because you're from a different server

They kinda do. We can see it even on boards, as different words get censored and pathetic trash is allowed to troll games in Korea, because they use real id and don't want to waste their e-cafe time for a game where they are behind.

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T07:31:42.789+0000)
>
> now it's my turn to say "prove it!"

"Kys" gets censored on euw forums.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EYGExWI6-why-is-toxicity-not-punished-in-korea
"F%%%%t" doesn't get you ifs'd in Russia.

i think you missunderstood me. 

By "proof", i meant an actual relevant source like Tantram or some other rioter or an official statement by a legit source...

... not a random thread where random people gave their personal opinions on the matter

try again

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=000200000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-11-13T08:01:22.234+0000)
>
> i think you missunderstood me. 
> 
> By "proof", i meant an actual relevant source like Tantram or some other rioter or an official statement by a legit source...
> 
> ... not a random thread where random people gave their personal opinions on the matter
> 
> try again

Riot's policies are regional. You are free to not accept it.

>Riot's policies are regional. You are free to not accept it.

so you have no proof of your claims... just like every other time you typed at me...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

at least you're consistent

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=00020000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T10:54:19.201+0000)
>
> so you have no proof of your claims... just like every other time you typed at me...
> 
> at least you're consistent

You are either a troll or a demagogue, requesting redundant proofs for something that has already been proven multiple times or something that is self-evident.

Policies do depend on the region and you can quickly get that information first-hand, going to euw boards and trying to type "kys", which doesn't get filtered here.

>requesting redundant proofs for something that has already been proven multiple times or something that is self-evident.

again. present the proof instead of just claiming that it exists!

>Policies do depend on the region and you can quickly get that information first-hand, going to euw boards and trying to type "kys", which doesn't get filtered here.

lack of filters for a word =/= "this word is allowed"

there are planty of people on na with bans due to "kys". like [this one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/rJy7P1H0-permanently-banned)

you can't define what is punishable in the game by what the boards filter
Öähm .. maybe because they would write something like this педик instead of %%%%%%?!

> [{quoted}](name=Bettnachleger,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T07:55:46.889+0000)
>
> Öähm .. maybe because they would write something like this педик instead of %%%%%%?!

They would. It's a literal translation.
I feel like you are supposed to look at it as a reason to not be toxic

> [{quoted}](name=Nuri Da Fox,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-13T04:35:20.586+0000)
>
> I feel like you are supposed to look at it as a reason to not be toxic

Toxic is a big word.
There are people getting moderated simply saying to report someone ruining INTENTIONALLY your game.
you won't get it until the end of the season rewards are  given out

> [{quoted}](name=Namîste,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-13T04:29:01.713+0000)
>
> you won't get it until the end of the season rewards are  given out

No they’re saying they aren’t getting rewards because they aren’t honor level 2 (I think).  In which case... congrats that’s the point of the punishment lol.  Riot doesn’t reward dishonorable players.
I mean if they aren't honor 2 then, maybe I'm just mean, but isn't that their fault for being toxic, or inting, or just breaking the summoner's code?

> [{quoted}](name=Namîste,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cXW5Y87z,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T18:32:40.379+0000)
>
> I mean if they aren't honor 2 then, maybe I'm just mean, but isn't that their fault for being toxic, or inting, or just breaking the summoner's code?

I was just clarifying because your comment made it sound like you didn’t realize they’d been punished.
